dict.string: #!/usr/bin/env ruby string = STDIN.read string = "#999" if string.empty? prefix, string = string.match(/(#?)(.*)/)[1,2] string = $1 * 2 + $2 * 2 + $3 * 2 if string =~ /^(.)(.)(.)$/ def_col = ' default color {' + string.scan(/../).map { |i| i.hex * 257 }.join(",") + '}' col = `osascript 2>/dev/null -e 'tell app "TextMate" to choose color#{def_col}'` exit 200 if col == "" col=col.scan(/\d+/).map { |i| "%02X" % (i.to_i / 257) }.join("") print prefix if /(.)\1(.)\2(.)\3/.match(col) then print $1 + $2 + $3 else print col end
